p: Viral RNA isolation and RT-PCR amplification for protease-reverse transcriptase (PRRT), reverse transcriptase (RT), and integrase (IN) were completed as previously described [ 20] with subtype-optimized primers. Next-Generation-Sequencing (MiSeq, Illumina) with a 15% cut-off was performed. Initial subtyping was done based on the RT (or PR region when the RT was not available) using the geno2pheno system ( http://www.geno2pheno.org/) and Stanford HIVdb PROGRAM (HIVdb; https://hivdb.stanford.edu/hivdb/by-mutations/). Final subtyping of A1 or A-containing recombinant forms was based on phylogenetic analysis.
